start: This is hello text in english
lang_on_start:
Is your language English?
If not, type /lang to change language

lang.name: English
lang.question: What language do you want to use?

start.text:
Should the task be *repeated*?
Events like birthdays, anniversaries are repeated

repeat.text: How often should the task be repeated?

daily.text:
Send the time of the task as *HH:MM*\.
Example: 12:00 or 12\.00

calendar_1.text: Select the date of the task

send_time.multiple:
Send the time of the task as *HH:MM*\.
Example: 12:00 or 12\.00
send_time.single:
Send the time of the task as *HH:MM*\.
Example: 12:00 or 12\.00

send_reminder_name.text: Send the name of the task

send_reminder_text.text: Send the text of the task

has_it_beforehand.text:
Do you want to set a task before the event?
For example, if you set a task for a birthday, you can set a task for a week before the birthday.

select_beforehand_time.text:
Select how much time before the event should the task be set or send the time before the event.
Example: 5 days
supported time units: minutes, hours, days, weeks

custom_beforehand_time.text:
Send the time before the event.
Example: 5 days
supported time units: hours, days, weeks, months

calendar_month.text:
Select day/days of the task
You can select one or more days by clicking on them

calendar_weekdays.text:
Select day/days of the task
You can select one or more days by clicking on them

calendar_multiselect.text:
Select day/days of the task
You can select one or more days by clicking on them

task_name.text: Send the name of the task
